p: Log epidemic intensity was modeled with a normal distribution, and log epidemic duration was modeled with a normal distribution without the offset term in Eq 2. Consequently, we note that all epidemic intensity models examine the relative risk of disease burden, while epidemic duration models examine the duration in weeks. Multi-season models included all terms in Eq 2. Model coefficients were interpreted as statistically significant if the 95% credible interval for a parameterâ€™s posterior distribution failed to include zero.
